string.value: Typeface © The Monotype Corporation plc. Data © The Monotype Corporation plc/Type Solutions Inc. 1990-1992. All Rights Reserved
Courierª Trademark of The Monotype Corporation plc registered in certain countries.

Designed as a typewriter face for IBM, Courier was re drawn by Adrian Frutiger for IBM Selectric series. A typical fixed pitch design, monotone in weight and slab serif in concept. Used to emulate typewriter output for reports, tabular work and technical documentation.

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT
This typeface is the property of Monotype Typography and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this typeface software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of Monotype's licensees.

If you have any question concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software or contact Monotype for a copy of the license agreement.
